title: Joke banning system.
body:
Ok so before i get started I would just like to state I'm not here to cry about getting banned nor do i care but to ask some questions. 

I just had a game where i was the victim 3 people on my team was trash talking and crying all game at me and my replies were (ONLY) in response to when they trashed talked me or had a little sook in all chat  and no i do not regret saying anything that i said. was my language negative ? yes it was but was it uncalled for ? or for no reason ?i don't know you be the judge. I don't care that i got banned or am i here to cry about getting banned. But i want to make it public what a joke the ban system is.


so this is what happened in the game i guess i have to write the whole thing out since I don't get why if riot is going to ban you they don't send you the whole chat history of that game, so it makes you look like you're the bad person. 

Our team 

singed top doing the usual run into tower and intionally feeding 
Lee jungle Myself
Corki mid 
Rengar and alistair bot. 


so as the game went on everything was fine and normal i ganked mid twice before i would gank i would ping twice i went in and the corki just sits there farming and does nothing so as it says on the chat "dont expect anymore ganks". so i left mid then i proceed to go bot to gank. they had a j4 and cait vsing our rengar and alistair they were just before the enemy tower  again i pinged and typed "push it in" i waited for a good 20-30 seconds and they just decided to ignore me all together and farm so ok thats fine i left bot lane and never went back down since they did not want to play as a team so i camped top and helped singed the game was fine until our bot lane started losing then proceeded to talk trash to j4 and cait about j4 (I quote) "playing a cheap assassin in this patch and he's shiiit and he that he actually thinks he's good" so they were having their trash talk with the other teams bot laners then our alistair decided to start on me and say im shiiit and consistently trash talk me and spam report lee all game along with rengar because i just ignore them and they were losing and feeding. and yet after the game I get banned from one game? literally it just says game 1 chat history.  what kind of ban system is this? if you're going to ban me then at least send me the whole chat history of everyone in the game.

Game 1
Kei Style: do that feeding crap and i will report you -  towards singed after he started running into tower and intentionally feeding. after that he stopped. 
Kei Style: dont expect anymore ganks                      - after ganking mid twice 
Kei Style: push it in                                                      - while ganking bot
Kei Style: stfu                                                               - roughly about 10-15 min into the game when bot was talking trash with the others then started on me.   
Kei Style: legit                                                              
Kei Style: lmao                                                             
Kei Style: im mad ?                                                     - the enemy jungler decided to start trash talking me because i killed her twice so she deiced to have a go 
                                                                                       at me and join in with alistair who was still crying in all chat about report lee ' ect. ect.  
                                                                                       
  
Kei Style: u just got rekt twice kid pretty sure you're the mad one  - so i replied to their jungler she was fed from out bot and thought she was good so she 
                                                                                                                    decided to start trash talking me after i killed her when she had 9 kills and i only had 2 
                                                                                                                     and she got butt hurt so i replied. 
                                                     
Kei Style: is that why youre 3-4                                                                 - corki then decided to join in and trash talk me and said i was shiiit or something so i 
                                                                                                                        replied
Kei Style: mad noob ?                                                                              
Kei Style: you got fed of retards and you still get rekt by me             - enemy jungler was having another go at me so i replied.
Kei Style: -7 deaths ?                                                                              - at this point i had killed her roughly 7 times 
Kei Style: rekt again noob                                                                      - i decided to give her a taste of her own medicine since she wanted to be a smart ass
Kei Style: mad ?                                                                                        everytime i killed her
Kei Style: why you so quiet now nid ?                                                  - at this point she was -8-9 deaths so she stopped trash talking and i stopped. 
Kei Style: yeah nah enjoy your report instead kid                              - alistair is still crying and spamming report lee he's trash and he's the most pathetic 
                                                                                                                   person on this team in all chat so i replied
Kei Style: yes the pathetic person here is you crying all game        - at alistar
Kei Style: still crying ?                                                                          - alistair still proceeding to trash talk   - roughly about 35-40 min into the game here now.                
Kei Style: ok cool story                                                                         - alistar saying that rengar is actually better then me and im trash. i replied. 
Kei Style: 10-9 ?                                                                                   - corki decided to trash talk me and say report this troll lee.  so i replied. corki score was 
                                                                                                                 10-9
Kei Style: troll ?
Kei Style: gg                                                                                            - I died and the game pretty much ended here 
Kei Style: literally entire team is crying lol 
Kei Style: just ignore the kids                                                               - both our bot and mid was crying in all chat about reporting me and that apprently i was 
                                                                                                                   saying that i think im carrying ect. and the enemy team replied "he is carry you guys lol"
Kei Style: cant reason with morons                                                      so i replied to him just ignore the kids you cant reason with morons. 

game ends.  Our whole teams score was 



[](http://www.lolking.net/summoner/oce/10772030/Kei%20Style#/matches)     the match score of the game is the first one.

replies.body:
There's a special set of people I think you are now very familiar with. 

Ban baiters. 

They get a kick out of watching people get angry. And they don't care. It's just what they do. I had a ban baiter myself in one specific game talking absolutely no sense, but it was very aggrovating, and annoying. That doesn't mean I've had others, but they're all asshats the same. 

The system is playing us, at the same time as someone else playing the system.

Ban-baiters get off scott free because the reports of this have to be manually validated instead of validated by swearbots or leaverbuster.

Rewards the people who ruin the game, punishes those emotionally invested in the game.
glad to see toxic players replying right in here lul.
